trans-unit.source: Represents a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox" /> that is properly rendered in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> is the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> optimized for hosting in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> 是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>適合裝載在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>。

trans-unit.source: A subset of the hosted control's properties and events are exposed at the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> level, but the underlying <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> control is fully accessible through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.ComboBox%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 裝載的控制項的屬性和事件的子集會公開在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>層級，但基礎<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>控制項是完全可透過存取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.ComboBox%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> displays an editing field combined with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, allowing the user to select from the list or to enter new text.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>顯示結合的編輯欄位<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，讓使用者從清單中選取或輸入新的文字。

trans-unit.source: By default, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> displays an edit field with a hidden drop-down list.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>會顯示與隱藏的下拉式清單編輯欄位。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.DropDownStyle%2A> property determines the style of combo box to display.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.DropDownStyle%2A>屬性會決定要顯示的下拉式方塊的樣式。

trans-unit.source: You can enter a value that allows for a simple drop-down, where the list always displays, a drop-down list box, where the text portion is not editable and you must select an arrow to view the drop-down list box, or the default drop-down list box, where the text portion is editable and the user must press the arrow key to view the list.
trans-unit.target: 您可以輸入簡單下拉式清單中，永遠顯示清單，下拉式清單方塊中，其中是無法編輯的文字部分，而您必須選取要檢視下拉式清單方塊箭號，或預設下拉式清單方塊中，其中的文字部分是 ed 所允許的值itable 且使用者必須按方向鍵來檢視清單。

trans-unit.source: To always display a list that the user cannot edit, use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要一律顯示使用者無法編輯的清單，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: To add objects to the list at run time, assign an array of object references with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入至清單的物件，在執行階段，請將指派的物件參考陣列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The list then displays the default string value for each object.
trans-unit.target: 然後，此清單會顯示每個物件的預設字串值。

trans-unit.source: You can add individual objects with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以加入具有個別物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Add%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: In addition to display and selection functionality, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> also provides features that enable you to efficiently add items to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> and to find text within the items of the list.
trans-unit.target: 除了顯示和選取的功能，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>也提供功能，可讓您有效率地將項目加入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>並找出清單的項目內的文字。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.BeginUpdate%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.EndUpdate%2A> methods enable you to add a large number of items to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> without the control being repainted each time an item is added to the list.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.BeginUpdate%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.EndUpdate%2A>方法可讓您新增的項目大量<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>不用每次重繪控制項項目加入至清單。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.FindString%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.FindStringExact%2A> methods enable you to search for an item in the list that contains a specific search string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.FindString%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.FindStringExact%2A>方法可讓您搜尋包含特定的搜尋字串的清單中的項目。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> property to get or set the current item in the drop-down list, and use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectedItem%2A> property to get or set a reference to the current item in the drop-down list.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>屬性來取得或設定目前的項目在下拉式清單中，並使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectedItem%2A>屬性來取得或設定下拉式清單中的目前項目的參考。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> with various property settings, including automatic completion.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>具有各種屬性設定，包括自動完成。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox" /> class.
The name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox" /> class with the specified name.
The base control.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox" /> class derived from a base control.
The operation is not supported.

Gets or sets the custom string collection to use when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.AutoCompleteSource" /> property is set to <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteSource.CustomSource" />.
An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteStringCollection" /> that contains the strings.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteStringCollection" />所包含的字串。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> properties to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> that automatically completes input strings by comparing the prefix being entered to the prefixes of all strings in a maintained source.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>屬性來建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>自動完成輸入的字串比較輸入中維護的來源的所有字串的前置詞的前置詞。

trans-unit.source: This is useful for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> controls in which URLs, addresses, file names, or commands will be frequently entered.
trans-unit.target: 這適用於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>所在 Url、 地址、 檔案名稱或命令會經常輸入的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A> property is optional, but you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteSource.CustomSource> in order to use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>屬性是選擇性的但是您必須設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteSource.CustomSource>才能使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>。

trans-unit.source: You must use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> properties together.
trans-unit.target: 您必須使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>屬性放在一起。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定各種語法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>屬性，包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>屬性。

One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode.None" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode.None" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A> property to get or set the behavior of automatic completion.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>屬性來取得或設定自動完成行為。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting various <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> properties, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定各種語法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>屬性，包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>屬性。

One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteSource" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteSource" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteSource.None" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteSource.None" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> property to get or set automatic completion strings.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>屬性來取得或設定自動完成字串。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting various <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> properties, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定各種語法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>屬性，包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>屬性。

The background image displayed in the control.
trans-unit.target: 在控制項中顯示的背景影像。

trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

One of the values of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout" /> 的其中一個值。

trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: Maintains performance when items are added to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox" /> one at a time.
This method prevents the control from painting until the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.EndUpdate%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會讓控制項繪製直到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.EndUpdate%2A>方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The preferred way to add items to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> is to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A> method through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.Items%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 將項目加入，最好<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>是使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A>方法，透過<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.Items%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to add an array of items to the list at one time.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您一次加入清單的項目陣列。

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to add items one at a time using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Add%2A> method, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.BeginUpdate%2A> method to prevent the control from repainting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> each time an item is added to the list.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果您想要加入的項目一於使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Add%2A>方法，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.BeginUpdate%2A>方法，以防止重繪控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>每個項目新增至清單的時間。

trans-unit.source: Once you have completed the task of adding items to the list, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.EndUpdate%2A> method to enable the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> to repaint.
trans-unit.target: 完成的工作項目加入清單後，請呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.EndUpdate%2A>方法，以啟用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>來重新繪製。

trans-unit.source: This way of adding items can prevent flicker during the drawing of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> when a large number of items are being added to the list.
trans-unit.target: 將項目加入這種方式可以防止重繪閃動繪製期間<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>當正在大量項目加入至清單。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" /> in which the user can enter text, along with a list from which the user can select.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" /> for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" />如<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.ComboBox%2A> property to get <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> properties, methods, and events that have not been wrapped into <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.ComboBox%2A>屬性來取得<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>屬性、 方法和事件的未包裝成<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default spacing, in pixels, between the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox" /> and an adjacent item.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.DefaultMargin%2A> property to configure a default size for your <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.DefaultMargin%2A>屬性可設定的預設大小您<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: This is more efficient than setting the size in the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 這是將大小設定於建構函式更有效率。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox" />.
The default <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox" /> in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 預設值<see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />的<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox" />像素為單位。

trans-unit.source: The default size is 100 x 20 pixels.
trans-unit.target: 預設大小為 100 x 20 像素。

trans-unit.source: In order to maintain better performance, you should not set the <xref:System.Drawing.Size> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> in its constructor.
trans-unit.target: 為了維護更佳的效能，您不應將<xref:System.Drawing.Size>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>其建構函式中。

trans-unit.source: The preferred method is to override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.DefaultSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 慣用的方法是覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.DefaultSize%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.DefaultSize" /> property in a derived class, it is preferable to return a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> object with the desired dimensions rather than overriding all the implementation.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.DefaultSize" />衍生類別中的屬性，最好是傳回<see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />物件所需的維度，而不是覆寫所有的實作。

trans-unit.target: 這個事件與這個類別無關。

For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.DropDown> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.DropDown>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> named `ToolStripComboBox1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>名為`ToolStripComboBox1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.DropDown> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.DropDown>事件。

For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height, in pixels, of the drop-down portion box of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox" />.
The height, in pixels, of the drop-down box.
trans-unit.target: 下拉式方塊的高度 (單位為像素)。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.DropDownHeight%2A> property resets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.IntegralHeight%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.DropDownHeight%2A>屬性重設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.IntegralHeight%2A>屬性`false`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting various <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> properties, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.DropDownHeight%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定各種語法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>屬性，包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.DropDownHeight%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value specifying the style of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox" />.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxStyle" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxStyle.DropDown" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxStyle.DropDown" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.DropDownStyle%2A> property controls the interface that is presented to the user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.DropDownStyle%2A>屬性會控制呈現給使用者介面。

trans-unit.source: You can enter a value that allows for a simple drop-down list box, where the list always displays, a drop-down list box, where the text portion is not editable and you must select an arrow to view the drop-down, or the default drop-down list box, where the text portion is editable and the user must press the arrow key to view the list.
trans-unit.target: 您可以輸入簡單的下拉式清單方塊中，其中永遠顯示清單，下拉式清單方塊中，其中的文字部分不是可編輯，而且您必須選取箭頭來檢視下拉式清單中，允許的值或預設下拉式清單方塊中，其中的文字部分是 editable 且使用者必須按方向鍵來檢視清單。

trans-unit.source: To always display a list that the user cannot edit, use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要一律顯示使用者無法編輯的清單，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting various <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> properties, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.DropDownStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定各種語法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>屬性，包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.DropDownStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.DropDownStyle" /> property has changed.
For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.DropDownStyleChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.DropDownStyleChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> named `ToolStripComboBox1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>名為`ToolStripComboBox1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.DropDownStyleChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.DropDownStyleChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width, in pixels, of the drop-down portion of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox" />.
The width, in pixels, of the drop-down box.
trans-unit.target: 下拉式方塊的寬度 (單位為像素)。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.DropDownWidth%2A> property to get or set the width of the drop-down portion of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.DropDownWidth%2A>屬性來取得或設定的下拉式部分的寬度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting various <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> properties, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.DropDownWidth%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定各種語法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>屬性，包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.DropDownWidth%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox" /> currently displays its drop-down portion.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox" /> currently displays its drop-down portion; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox" />目前顯示它的下拉部分，否則<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Resumes painting the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox" /> control after painting is suspended by the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.BeginUpdate" /> method.

The preferred way to add items to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> is to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A> method through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.Items%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 將項目加入，最好<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>是使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A>方法，透過<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.Items%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to add an array of items to the list at one time.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您一次加入清單的項目陣列。

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to add items one at a time using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Add%2A> method, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.BeginUpdate%2A> method to prevent the control from repainting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> each time an item is added to the list.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果您想要加入的項目一於使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Add%2A>方法，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.BeginUpdate%2A>方法，以防止重繪控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>每個項目新增至清單的時間。

trans-unit.source: Once you have completed the task of adding items to the list, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.EndUpdate%2A> method to enable the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> to repaint.
trans-unit.target: 完成的工作項目加入清單後，請呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.EndUpdate%2A>方法，以啟用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>來重新繪製。

trans-unit.source: This way of adding items can prevent flicker during the drawing of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> when a large number of items are being added to the list.
trans-unit.target: 將項目加入這種方式可以防止重繪閃動繪製期間<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>當正在大量項目加入至清單。

trans-unit.source: Finds the first item in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox" /> that starts with the specified string.
The <see cref="T:System.String" /> to search for.
Finds the first item in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox" /> that starts with the specified string.
The zero-based index of the first item found; returns -1 if no match is found.
The search performed by this method is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法所執行的搜尋不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter is a substring to compare against the text associated with the items in the combo box list.
trans-unit.target: `s`參數是要比較的下拉式方塊的清單中的項目相關聯的文字子字串。

trans-unit.source: The search performs a partial match starting from the beginning of the text, and returning the first item in the list that matches the specified substring.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋執行進行局部比對從文字的開頭開始，並傳回第一個項目在清單中符合指定的子字串。

trans-unit.source: You can then perform tasks, such as removing the item that contains the search text or changing the item's text.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以執行工作，例如移除包含搜尋文字的項目或變更項目的文字。

trans-unit.source: Once you have found the specified text, if you want to search for other instances of the text in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>, use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.FindString%2A> method to specify a starting index within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 一旦找到指定的文字，如果您想要搜尋的文字中的其他執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.FindString%2A>方法，以指定起始索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: If you want to perform a search for an exact word match instead of a partial match, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.FindStringExact%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要執行精確的字詞相符而不是在部分符合的搜尋，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.FindStringExact%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.String" /> to search for.
The zero-based index of the item before the first item to be searched.
Set to -1 to search from the beginning of the control.
Finds the first item after the given index which starts with the given string.
The zero-based index of the first item found; returns -1 if no match is found.
The search performed by this method is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法所執行的搜尋不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter is a substring to compare against the text associated with the items in the combo box list.
trans-unit.target: `s`參數是要比較的下拉式方塊的清單中的項目相關聯的文字子字串。

trans-unit.source: The search performs a partial match starting from the beginning of the text at the specified index, and returns the first item in the list that matches the specified substring.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋執行部分的比對，從頭開始於指定索引處的文字，然後傳回第一個項目清單中，符合指定的子字串。

trans-unit.source: You can then perform tasks, such as removing the item that contains the search text or changing the item's text.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以執行工作，例如移除包含搜尋文字的項目或變更項目的文字。

trans-unit.source: Once you have found the specified text, if you want to search for other instances of the text in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>, use this method to specify a starting index within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 一旦找到指定的文字，如果您想要搜尋的文字中的其他執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>，使用此方法來指定內的起始索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: If you want to perform a search for an exact word match instead of a partial match, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.FindStringExact%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要執行精確的字詞相符而不是在部分符合的搜尋，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.FindStringExact%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Finds the item that exactly matches the specified string.
The <see cref="T:System.String" /> to search for.
Finds the first item in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox" /> that exactly matches the specified string.
The zero-based index of the first item found; -1 if no match is found.
The search performed by this method is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法所執行的搜尋不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter is a substring to compare against the text associated with the items in the combo box list.
trans-unit.target: `s`參數是要比較的下拉式方塊的清單中的項目相關聯的文字子字串。

trans-unit.source: The search performs a partial match starting from the beginning of the text at the specified index, and returns the first item in the list that matches the specified substring.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋執行部分的比對，從頭開始於指定索引處的文字，然後傳回第一個項目清單中，符合指定的子字串。

trans-unit.source: You can then perform tasks, such as removing the item that contains the search text or changing the item's text.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以執行工作，例如移除包含搜尋文字的項目或變更項目的文字。

trans-unit.source: Once you have found the specified text, if you want to search for other instances of the text in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>, use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.FindString%2A> method to specify a starting index within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 一旦找到指定的文字，如果您想要搜尋的文字中的其他執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.FindString%2A>方法，以指定起始索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: If you want to search for a partial match instead of the exact word, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.FindString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要搜尋部分相符項目，而不是正確的字，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.FindString%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.String" /> to search for.
The zero-based index of the item before the first item to be searched.
Set to -1 to search from the beginning of the control.
Finds the first item after the specified index that exactly matches the specified string.
The zero-based index of the first item found; returns -1 if no match is found.
The search performed by this method is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法所執行的搜尋不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter is a substring to compare against the text associated with the items in the combo box list.

trans-unit.source: The search performs a partial match starting from the beginning of the text at the specified index, and returns the first item in the list that matches the specified substring.

trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以執行工作，例如移除包含搜尋文字的項目或變更項目的文字。

trans-unit.source: Once you have found the specified text, if you want to search for other instances of exact text in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>, use this method to specify a starting index within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 一旦找到指定的文字，如果您想要搜尋的其他執行個體中的確切文字<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>，使用此方法來指定內的起始索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: If you want to search for a partial match instead of the exact word, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.FindString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要搜尋部分相符項目，而不是正確的字，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.FindString%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the appearance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox" />.
One of the values of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle" /> 的其中一個值。

trans-unit.source: The options are <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle.Flat" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle.Popup" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle.Standard" />, and <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle.System" />.
trans-unit.target: 這些選項包括 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle.Flat" />、<see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle.Popup" />、<see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle.Standard" /> 和 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle.System" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle.Popup" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle.Popup" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.FlatStyle%2A> property to get or set the display style of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.FlatStyle%2A>屬性來取得或設定的顯示樣式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 4.5.2, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.FlatStyle%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle.Flat> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle.Popup>, the drop-down arrow may be resized.
trans-unit.target: 從.NET Framework 4.5.2 中，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.FlatStyle%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle.Flat>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle.Popup>，可能會調整大小的下拉式箭號。

trans-unit.source: Resizing is determined by the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry:
trans-unit.target: 調整大小取決於系統 DPI 設定時的 app.config 檔案包含下列項目：

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting various <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> properties, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.FlatStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定各種語法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>屬性，包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.FlatStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The index of the item to return the height of.
Returns the height, in pixels, of an item in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox" />.
The height, in pixels, of the item at the specified index.
The custom-sized area for a control.
Retrieves the size of a rectangular area into which a control can be fitted.
An ordered pair of type <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> representing the width and height of a rectangle.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox" /> should resize to avoid showing partial items.
<see langword="true" /> if the list portion can contain only complete items; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果清單部分只能包含完整項目，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, the control automatically resizes to ensure that an item is not partially displayed.
trans-unit.target: 當這個屬性設定為`true`，控制項會自動調整大小以確保不部分顯示項目。

trans-unit.source: If you want to maintain the original size of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> based on the space requirements of your form, set this property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要維護的原始大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>根據表單的空間需求，將此屬性設定為`false`。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> does not contain any items, this property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>不包含任何項目，這個屬性沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.DropDownHeight%2A> property resets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.IntegralHeight%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.DropDownHeight%2A>屬性重設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.IntegralHeight%2A>屬性`false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of the items contained in this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox" />.
A collection of items.
trans-unit.target: 項目的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of items to be shown in the drop-down portion of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox" />.
The maximum number of items in the drop-down portion.
trans-unit.target: 下拉式方塊部分中項目的最大數目。

trans-unit.source: The minimum for this property is 1 and the maximum is 100.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的最小值為 1，而最大值為 100。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.MaxDropDownItems%2A> property to get or set the maximum number of items to show in the drop-down portion of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.MaxDropDownItems%2A>屬性來取得或設定要顯示的下拉式部分中的項目數目上限<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting various <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> properties, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.MaxDropDownItems%2A> property.

Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectionChangeCommitted" /> event.
<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectionChangeCommitted> is raised only when the user changes the combo box selection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectionChangeCommitted> 僅當使用者變更下拉式方塊選取項目時，就會引發。

trans-unit.source: Do not use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectedIndexChanged> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValueChanged> to capture user changes, because those events are also raised when the selection changes programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 請勿使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectedIndexChanged>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValueChanged>來擷取使用者的變更，因為選取以程式設計方式變更時，也會引發這些事件。

trans-unit.source: The position of the first character in the current text selection within the text box.
The number of characters to select.
Selects a range of text in the editable portion of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox" />.
If you want to set the start position to the first character in the control's text, set the `start` parameter to zero.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要設定控制項的文字中的第一個字元的開始位置，設定`start`參數為零。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to select a substring of text, such as when searching through the text of the control and replacing information.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法，以選取的子字串的文字，例如當透過控制項的文字搜尋和取代的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="start" /> is less than zero.
-or-
<paramref name="start" /> minus <paramref name="length" /> is less than zero.
Selects all the text in the editable portion of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox" />.
Gets or sets the index specifying the currently selected item.
A zero-based index of the currently selected item.
trans-unit.target: 目前選取項目之以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: A value of negative one (-1) is returned if no item is selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果未選取任何項目，將傳回負一 (-1)。

trans-unit.source: This property indicates the zero-based index of the currently selected item in the combo box list.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性會指出下拉式方塊清單中目前選取之項目的以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Setting a new index raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectedIndexChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 設定新的索引會引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectedIndexChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: **Note** To deselect the currently selected item, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> to -1.
trans-unit.target: **請注意**以取消選取目前選取的項目，設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>為-1。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectedIndex" /> property has changed.
For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectedIndexChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectedIndexChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> named `ToolStripComboBox1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>名為`ToolStripComboBox1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectedIndexChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectedIndexChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets currently selected item in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox" />.
The object that is the currently selected item or <see langword="null" /> if there is no currently selected item.
trans-unit.target: 目前所選取項目的物件；如果目前沒有選取的項目，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectedItem%2A> property to an object, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> attempts to make that object the currently selected one in the list.
trans-unit.target: 當您將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectedItem%2A>屬性，此物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>嘗試使該物件清單中目前選取的一個。

trans-unit.source: If the object is found in the list, it is displayed in the edit portion of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> property is set to the corresponding index.
trans-unit.target: 如果在清單中找到物件，它會顯示在編輯部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>屬性設定為對應的索引。

trans-unit.source: If the object does not exist in the list, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> property is left at its current value.
trans-unit.target: 如果物件不在清單中，存在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>屬性留在目前的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text that is selected in the editable portion of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox" />.
A string that represents the currently selected text in the combo box.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示下拉式方塊中目前所選取的文字。

trans-unit.source: If <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.DropDownStyle" /> is set to <see langword="DropDownList" />, the return value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.DropDownStyle" /> 設定為 <see langword="DropDownList" />，則傳回的值是空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: You can assign text to this property to change the text currently selected in the combo box.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將文字指派給這個屬性，變更下拉式方塊中目前選取的文字。

trans-unit.source: If no text is currently selected in the combo box, this property returns a zero-length string.
trans-unit.target: 如果下拉式方塊中目前不選取任何文字，這個屬性會傳回零長度字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of characters selected in the editable portion of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox" />.
The number of characters selected in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 在選取的字元數<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox" />。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to determine whether any characters are currently selected in the combo box control before performing operations on the selected text.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷是否任何字元中目前所選取的下拉式方塊控制項選取的文字上執行作業之前，您可以使用這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: When the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectionLength%2A> property is set to a value that is larger than the number of characters within the text of the control, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectionLength%2A> property is set to the entire length of text within the control minus the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectionStart%2A> property (if any value is specified for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectionStart%2A> property).
trans-unit.target: 當值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectionLength%2A>屬性設定為值大於控制項的值的文字內的字元數，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectionLength%2A>屬性設定為完整的值減掉控制項內的文字長度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectionStart%2A>屬性 (如果指定的任何值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectionStart%2A>屬性)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the starting index of text selected in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox" />.
The zero-based index of the first character in the string of the current text selection.
trans-unit.target: 在目前文字選取的字串中第一個字元之以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: If no text is selected in the control, this property indicates the insertion point for new text.
trans-unit.target: 如果在控制項中不選取任何文字，則這個屬性會指出新文字的插入點。

trans-unit.source: If you set this property to a location beyond the length of the text in the control, the selection start position is placed after the last character.
trans-unit.target: 如果您為控制項中文字的長度超過設定這個屬性，在選取範圍開始位置位於最後一個字元之後。

trans-unit.source: When text is selected in the text box control, changing this property can release the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectionLength%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 文字方塊控制項中選取文字時，變更這個屬性可以發行的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectionLength%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the remaining text in the control after the position indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectionStart%2A> property is less than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectionLength%2A> property, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectionLength%2A> property is automatically decreased.
trans-unit.target: 如果所指出的位置之後控制項中的其餘文字<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectionStart%2A>屬性小於的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectionLength%2A>屬性、 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectionLength%2A>屬性就會自動減少。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectionStart%2A> property never causes an increase in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectionLength%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectionStart%2A>屬性永遠不會造成增加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectionLength%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the items in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox" /> are sorted.
<see langword="true" /> if the combo box is sorted; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果下拉式方塊已排序，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> sorts existing entries and add new entries to the appropriate sorted position in the list.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會指定是否<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>排序與現有項目，並新增到適當的排序位置清單中的項目。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to automatically sort items in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性，來自動排序中的項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: As items are added to a sorted <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>, the items are moved to the appropriate location in the sorted list.
trans-unit.target: 當項目新增至排序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>，項目會移至已排序的清單中的適當位置。

trans-unit.source: When you set the property to `false`, new items are added to the end of the existing list.
trans-unit.target: 當您將屬性設定為`false`，新的項目加入現有清單的結尾。

trans-unit.source: The sort is case-insensitive and in alphabetically ascending order.
trans-unit.target: 不區分大小寫，而依字母順序遞增順序排序。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting various <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> properties, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.Sorted%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定各種語法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>屬性，包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.Sorted%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox" /> text has changed.
For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.TextUpdate> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.TextUpdate>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> named `ToolStripComboBox1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>名為`ToolStripComboBox1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.TextUpdate> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.TextUpdate>事件。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representation of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox" />.
A string that represents the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox" />.
